snippet: President Aníbal Cavaco Silva announced a decision to allow Prime Minister Pedro Passos Coelho to start a second term in office amid tension that began after the general election on Oct. 4.
abstract: Portuguese Pres Anibal Cavaco Silva ends parliamentary stalemate by allowing incumbent Prime Min Pedro Passos Coelho to lead minority government; center-right coalition could still face no confidence vote, as three left-wing opposition parties plan to form alternative administration.
lead_paragraph: President Aníbal Cavaco Silva announced a decision to allow Prime Minister Pedro Passos Coelho to start a second term in office amid tension that began after the general election on Oct. 4.

headline.print_headline: Portugal’s President Clears the Way for a New Government
headline.main: Portugal’s President Clears the Way for a New Government
